name: louvred
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
describing a door or window with flat sloping pieces of wood, metal or glass across it to allow light and air to come in while keeping rain out: a louvred door/window She fiddled with the angle of the louvred blinds. See
louvre
More examplesFewer examplesLouvred side doors lined the corridor.The house was entered from a deck area surrounded on three sides by louvred shutters.Shafts of moonlight filter through the louvred window.
